long_description: Use this pressurized ink cartridge to refill your Fisher Space Pen(R). Pressurized cartridge continuously feeds ink to the tungsten carbide ball, allowing pen to write at any angle, even upside down. Visco-elastic ink writes smoothly and dependably on most surfaces, even underwater, over fingerprints, in freezing cold, in extreme heat and in space! Since 1967, Fisher Space Pens have been used by American astronauts on all manned space flights. Stainless-steel, precision-machined socket prevents leaks and oozing, yet delivers uniform ink flow. Ink will not dry out for over 100 years. Choose from black ink or blue ink.
short_description: Use this pressurized ink cartridge to refill your Fisher Space Pen(R).
